classification_data.text: cotel integración avanzada EL SUSCRITO REVISOR FISCAL DE LA SOCIEDAD COTEL S.A.S NIT .800.122.811-2 CERTIFICA QUE: De acuerdo con el Acta No. 083 de la Asamblea General Ordinaria de Accionistas de Cotel S.A.S de fecha marzo 29 de 2022, la nueva composición accionaria quedó registrada así: Accionista | Documento Identificación | No. de Acciones | % de Participación ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ James Herney Quijano Morán | 16.758.096 | 5.740.000.000 | 82% ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ María del Pilar Zuluaga Marín | 66.901.361 | 700.000.000 | 10% ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Nicolle Dayana Quijano Zuluaga | 1.107.089.788 | 210.000.000 | 3% ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Juan Pablo Quijano Zuluaga | 1.144.109.912 | 210.000.000 | 3% ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Cotel S.A.S | 800.122.811-2 | 140.000.000 | 2% ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Total | | 7.000.000.000 | 100% La nueva composición accionaria fue registrada en los libros contables, así mismo fue actualizado el libro de Registro de Accionistas. La presente certificación se expide en Santiago de Cali a los cinco (05) días del mes de febrero de 2024. Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar Revisor Fiscal TP No. 77391-T Miembro de Bloodhound Consulting Group SAS www.cotel.com.co

DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS: This document is clearly a certification of the ownership structure of Cotel S.A.S showing the shares held by each shareholder with exact percentages. It functions as a formal certification of the company's shareholding composition. 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION: Let me evaluate the strongest category matches: For ACC (Shareholding Structure Document): - Contains shareholder terminology: "Accionista", "composición accionaria" - Shows ownership percentages with numerical values: 82%, 10%, 3%, 3%, 2% - Lists exact number of shares for each owner - Shows owner identification with names and ID numbers - Explicitly states it's a certification of shareholding composition - Has been certified by a fiscal reviewer - Contains a complete table with clear ownership structure For CERL (Corporate Legal Existence): - While it mentions a company (Cotel S.A.S), it lacks comprehensive corporate history, board members, etc. - No mention of Chamber of Commerce as issuer - Missing key CERL elements like corporate duration, business object, etc. - Focus is clearly on ownership structure, not legal existence For RUB (Beneficial Ownership): - No mention of "Registro Único de Beneficiarios" or beneficial ownership terminology - No DIAN formulario structure - No beneficial ownership compliance context, just direct shareholders 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION: The document shows strong evidence for ACC category: - Clear must-have indicators for ACC are present: shareholder terminology, ownership percentages, shareholder names with ID numbers - Document's primary purpose is clearly to certify the shareholding structure - No conflicting signals with other categories - Very clear format of a shareholding certification Based on this analysis, the document should be classified as ACC (Shareholding Structure Document).
